summary: This mod aims to make your game experience better with changing game music to more atmospheric style.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][font=Arial][size=2][b][color=#ff7700][img]https://i.hizliresim.com/jWrARm.jpg[/img]
[/color][/b][/size][/font][u][color=#ffd966]
[/color][/u][/center][font=Arial][size=2][color=#ffd966]   [/color][color=#1155cc]  [u]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           [/u]  [/color]

Welcome to [/size][color=#ff7700]OperatiC’s Music Revolution Mod[/color][size=2]. This mod aims to make your game experience better with changing game music to more atmospheric style. Of course these tracks are not made by me. I just eliminate them with my taste and Skyrim world. [/size]

[size=2] Don't worry about criticism. Tell me if a track doesn't suit the type or too loud etc. I am open to all comments. Also you can suggest me some new tracks.

[color=#ffd966]  [/color][color=#1155cc]  [u]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            [/u]       [/color][/size][/font][color=#1155cc]
[/color][font=Arial]
[size=2] [/size]
[b][color=#00ffff]Exploring Suite:[/color][/b][size=2] I wanted to make the player feel alone and divinity power. Tracks are chosen with these keywords.[/size]

[list]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JsKN_f5mSLk]Explore Day 01[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pZq0ZbvbYy0]Explore Day 02[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9bHBxFKUPpI]Explore Day 03[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TYe63CZLmHc]Explore Day 04[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CkM8OgjGGIk]Explore Day 05[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5A8yYIy6fjg]Explore Day 06[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=StTunEWJxYw]Explore Day 07[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KNe6c9wc6JE]Explore Day 08[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gvlf-madfS4]Explore Day 09[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p2FkMY_Zi5M]Explore Dusk 01[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DWriuyF9y7Y]Explore Dusk 02[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-cNR9WBVQgw]Explore Dusk 03[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fw15Vp5zeDc]Explore Morning 01[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nOnT9rKgLWw]Explore Morning 02[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1oTbyENpX58]Explore Night 01[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ch-ZAhrXWKs]Explore Night 02[/url] 
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gsfVuLEiyKo%EF%BB%BF]Explore Night 03[/url] 
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ULwaXoO1BuY]Explore Night 04[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dBd_3inddWM]Explore Night 05[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Lcl0cRDDps]Explore Night 06[/url]
[/list][b] [/b]
[b][color=#e69138]Town/Village Suite:[/color] [/b][size=2]Of course everyone wants to feel safe in town and villages. These suite will feel you safe but at the same time you will feel like to be[/size]
[size=2]part of outside of town and village.[/size]

[list]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eD0XEH3qVCk]Town 01[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8DSeZji2x-Y]Town 02[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xAaHns5TIkk]Town 03[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YJ1G7jK-_nk]Town 04[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3zDMsoEj_gU]Village 01[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PRNC_gmQhyA]Village 02[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VD65ruEQI50 ]Village 03[/url]
[/list]
[b][color=#ffff00]Tavern Suite:[/color] [/b][size=2]Tavern music must make you feel different from other tracks. I chose nice guitar tunes for tavern.[/size]

[list]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KaKAI71lN14]Tavern 01 [/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0PVU388Deh4]Tavern 02[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2XOciSjxocI]Tavern 03[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vVxPwycOGHc]Tavern 04[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LC1F1uEmKn8]Tavern 05[/url]
[/list][size=2] [/size]
[b][color=#ff0000]Combat Suite[/color]: [/b][size=2]I tried to choose less intense tracks except dragon combats. Because while being with combat mudcrab or skeever intense combat[/size]
[size=2]music looks funny and unnecessary. Also I added to all normal combat tracks “fade in” or  “crescendo”. This will make the track more intense as longer the combat. [/size]

[list]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fL9-t0UecJ8]Combat 01[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=odZJMAy4JKE]Combat 02[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Aj6ksc1UppE]Combat 03[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RcyIe0JoKCQ]Combat 04[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kmxip3Ei0lY]Combat 05[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SJ5Zx-XNUQg]Combat Boss 01[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ENHnVCPdRw4]Combat Boss 02[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dOXj3QuIItI]Combat Boss 03[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JlXl9WyxlRI]Combat Boss 04[/url]
[/list][b] [/b]
[b][color=#000000]Dungeon Suite: [/color][/b][size=2]It’s not very different except it’s more darker and creepy.[/size]
[size=2] [/size]
[list]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F7hBP5jkhZc]Dungeon 01[/url]
[*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nZG2tEj64QY]Dungeon 02[/url]

[b][color=#e06666] Installation
[/color][/b][color=#ffffff][size=2] Extract file to your Skyrim's data folder or use NMM.


[/size][/color]         [color=#c27ba0]Don't forget endorse if you like the mod.[/color]
[/font]
